definition: two chambers (of legislative assembly), e.g. House of Representatives and Senate
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)

sentences.english: House and Senate conferees have struck a deal on the new farm bill.
sentences.chinese: 参众两院与会代表已就新的农业法案达成协议。

sentences.english: Upper house of Britain's bicameral Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 英国两院制议会的上院。

sentences.english: In Washington, DC, Congress is holding a bicameral tribute;
sentences.chinese: 在华盛顿特区，国会两院将表示他们的敬意。

sentences.english: Although the Senate is considered the upper house of the chambers has equal power.
sentences.chinese: 虽然参议院被认为是上院，但实际上两院是平级的。

sentences.english: But politicians on both sides of the congressional aisle have complained about the Pentagon escaping this stringency.
sentences.chinese: 但是国会两院都抱怨五角大楼受到了特别优待。

sentences.english: Yemen is a republic with a bicameral legislature.
sentences.chinese: 也门是采用两院制立法机构的共和国。

sentences.english: The leadership in both chambers is largely unchanged from 2008.
sentences.chinese: 参众两院的领导层与2008年时基本未变。

sentences.english: A black-headed gull flies in front of the Houses of Parliament in London, England.
sentences.chinese: 一只黑头鸥在英国伦敦议会两院前方飞行着。

sentences.english: The Congress is bicameral, consisting of the Senate and the House of Representatives.
sentences.chinese: 国会是两院制的，由参议院和众议院组成。

sentences.english: The bill was passed by close votes in the House and Senate.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案在参众两院以非常接近的票数获得了通过。

sentences.english: I was in the recently held conference academicians praise you.
sentences.chinese: 我还在最近召开的两院院士大会上表扬了你。

sentences.english: It can also prevent the National People's Congress from intervening their work.
sentences.chinese: 又可以防止人大对“一府两院”工作的过多干预。
国会是一个两院制的立法机关。

sentences.english: The constitution provides for an elected two-chamber legislature.
sentences.chinese: 宪法规定设置经选举产生的两院制立法机构。

sentences.english: The two houses held slipshod hearings and debates on the bill for several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 参众两院对此法进行了数周马虎的听证和辩论。

definition: lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
abbr. for 參議院|参议院[can1 yi4 yuan4], senate/upper chamber (of legislative assembly)
